questions.marker_instruction: Sebenzisa irubhrikhi esekhasini lama-40 ukumaka i-eseyi.
questions.topic: Kuyiqiniso ukuthi uma umuntu efuna ukufunda kumele adele konke njengoba imbongi idele ikhaya iyofuna ulwazi.

introduction: Kuyiqiniso ukuthi uma umuntu efuna ukufunda kumele adele konke njengoba imbongi idele ikhaya iyofuna ulwazi.

points: Imbongi inethemba lokuthola ulwazi ngokuvuka ekuseni kakhulu ukuze iye esikhungweni semfundo njengoba ithi, 'Kusempondozankomo …'.
Imbongi iyayilangazelela imfundo ngoba iyaphokophela ngokuhamba indlela ende iyofuna kwezinye izindawo ezikude nekhaya njengoba ihamba yenyusa 'amaqele'.
Ihamba le ndlela ukuze iyothola ukukhanyiseleka engqondweni ngemfundo ejulile yingakho ithi, 'Ngiyoncel' amanzi ngobhaqa.'
Imbongi inentshisekelo ngenxa yokuthi yona yakhetha ukuqhubeka nokufunda yashiya owabo/ontanga bezidlalela 'osebeni, bedoba izinhlanzi'.
Imbongi ibuye ikhombise ukudideka ngenxa yokuthi imfundo iyadida ngoba akukho muntu ongathi usefunde ngokwanele usazi yonke into emhlabeni njengoba ithi, 'Uyimpambankwici weNjulase.'
Imbongi iyabalisa ngenxa yokuthi iyokuthola nini ukuphumula ngoba nomzimba usuyazwela ukukhathala ngokuba ihlezi ifunda njalo yingakho ithi, '… osufohlok' umhlandla.'

Imbongi iyaqhubeka ibonakala inokudideka ngoba isho ukuthi imfundo 'iyimpicabadala' ngenxa yokuthi imfundo iyinkinga kubantu abancane nakwabadala ngoba ngisho noma ifundisiwe kepha luyakhohlwakala ulwazi olufundile.
Imbongi ikhombisa ukuba nethemba lokuthi kungenzeka kube khona abangafunda balithole iqiniso noma ulwazi ngale ndida eyimfundo njengoba ikhuluma ngemfumbe nempicabadala'.
Iphinde imbongi ibe nethemba lokuthi mhlawumbe uma seyidlulile emhlabeni abasele bayokwazi ukuthola iqiniso ngokujula kwemfundo.

conclusion: Imbongi ikwazile ukukhetha amagama agqamisa umoya.
La magama agqamisa umoya wokulangazelela, wokudideka nentshisekelo.
Imbongi ephokophelele ngayo ukuzuza imfundo ephezulu etholakala ezindaweni ezikude.

questions.notes: Nikeza amamaki amabili kuleyo naleyo mpendulo echanile.

model_answers: Umbizi / i-Aphostrofi
Imbongi ikhuluma nokufa engathi ibhekene nakho ngqo.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma esigagulile isifengqo wanikeza nencazelo

model_answers: Umqondo oqukethwe umugqa wesi-4 owokuthi la mandla amakhulu kangaka kuwatholaphi ukufa.
Emgqeni wesi-5 ilinganisa amandla okufa namandla anjengawamabutho akwaMandlakazi.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ewuchazile umqondo wemigqa

model_answers: Imbongi ibihlose ukukhombisa ukuxakeka/ukudideka yilobu bubi namandla ukufa okunawo angaziwa ukuthi akwazi kanjani ukubulala nabantu abadala nabaphile saka.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eyivezile inhloso

model_answers: Le migqa ingelekelele ukuqonda ukuthi imbongi inomoya wokudideka/wokudumala/wokukhathazeka ngenxa yokuthi abanye bayakwazi ukuthi ukufa sekuke kwavakasha bengazange bavume ukuthi bavakashelwe.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ewuvezile umoya

model_answers: Imbongi iphumelele kahle ukusethulela indikimba yokufa ngoba ikhuluma nakho ngqo ukufa.
Ize izibuze nemibuzo engadingi mpendulo mayelana nakho.
Isho nokuthi akukhethi kuthatha abancane kanye nabadala futhi baningi asebezithole behlaselwa ngukufa.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma echazile ngendikimba yokufa

model_answers: Ukwenzasamuntu/isenzasamuntu.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza imaki elilodwa uma esishilo isifengqo

model_answers: Umqondo oqukethwe yibinza lesi-3 owokuthi kuleli dwala kulapho iNkosi uShaka abikezela khona ukuqhamuka kwabelungu okwabe sekwenzeka nangempela sebelunguza olwandle ayebabone emi phezu kwaleli dwala.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma echaze kafushane umqondo

model_answers: Inhloso yembongi yokusebenzisa le-enjambamenti ukuxhumanisa umqondo oqale emgqeni we-14 kuya kowe-16 nokufunda ngokushesha/ukunganqamuli umqondo/ukwakha ilukuluku.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eyishilo inhloso ye-injambamenti wasekela

model_answers: La magama angelekelele ukuba ngiqonde umoya wokuzigqaja.
Imbongi izigqaja ngemvelo eyidwala equkethe umlando wesizwe lapho amabutho ayeziqeqeshela khona.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma echazile umoya wasekela

model_answers: Imbongi iphumelele kahle ukudlulisa indikimba yobuqhawe/yomlando weNkosi uShaka eyabumba isizwe samaZulu ngendlela enobuhlakani isebenzisana nebutho layo, yalinda ukufika kwabelungu ukuze ivikele isizwe sayo.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ephawulile ngendikima wesekela

model_answers: I-okzimoroni
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza imaki elilodwa uma egagulile isifengqo

model_answers: Imvumelwano siqalo 'Lu …' idala umgqumo omnandi osamculo ogcizelela ukuthi lolu cu yilona oluhlanganisa izithandani futhi luyisivumelwano salokho ezikuthembisile.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma echazile ngemvumelwano

model_answers: Isenzasamuntu sinomthelela wokuthi ngiqonde ukuthi uthando luqala kancane kancane.
Intombi ize ibe namahloni okuyibuka ngqo insizwa ezinhlamvini zamehlo njengoba emsulwa, ethambile, enganasici futhi edinga ukuphathwa kahle inakekekelwe.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma echazile ngesenzasamuntu

model_answers: Ngicabanga ukuthi umyalezo uthi, 'uthando luphathwa kahle'/uluhloniphe uma ungalwazisi noma ungaluphathi kahle nangenhlonipho luyogqashuka okuwuphawu lokuphela kothando bese konakala izinto kakhulu zibe inhlakanhlaka zingalungiseki.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma enikezile umyalezo wasekela

model_answers: Le nkondlo inesigqi esinensayo ngenxa yomoya wokukhathazeka kwentombi ebhekene nobunzima bokuhlulwa uthando lwensizwa.
Ibuka ubunzima okumele idlule kubona uma yakha lolu cu oluwuphawu lothando uma isiqoma insizwa.
Siyanensa ngenxa yomoya wokuzwa uthando alwakhayo uze amxwayise kanti inemigqa eminingi evalelike, eminingi imigqa inamagama amane.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma esihlaziyile isigqi wasekela

questions.text: 'YEBO-KE NSIZWA' – GC NYANDA no JJ THWALA

model_answers: Uncoma ubuhle ubabaza ubuhlakani,
Uhluphekile impela ngiyezwa,
Imvumelwanosiqalo.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma etomulile washo uhlobo

model_answers: Imbongi isebenzise isikhawu/isizura u- ',' ukuphumula nokuhlukanisa ukuveza ubunzima bendlela le nsizwa esiyihambile yeshela, ifuna uthando kule ntombi.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma echazile ukusetshenziswa kwesikhawu/isizura

model_answers: Imbongi isebenzise ukuxhumanasiqalo kanye nokuxhumanamaphakathi 'Noma ngingenawo …' ukugqamisa /ukugcizelela ukuthi noma ingenabo ubuciko nobugagu bokuqophisana nale nsizwa eyisesheli kepha inakho efisa ukukusho.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ekuchazile ukusetshenziswa kokuxhumana

model_answers: Imbongi ihlose ukuqhathanisa izigaba zokukhula kwentombi ukuthi lo oweshelwayo angeke avume ngisho noma ngabe ukusiphi isigaba okungaba esokuqoma noma esokudlulelwa yisikhathi sokugana.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eyivezile inhloso yokusebenza kwamagama

model_answers: Imbongi iphumelele kahle ukuveza umqondo wothando ngoba ithi noma ngabe isisezingeni lokuthanda umuntu wesilisa kepha yona ayinalo uthando lwale nsizwa.
Iphinde ithi ukugqoka kahle kwayo akusho ukuthi isuke ifuna ukuheha le nsizwa ngoba ayikakafuni ukugqoka izingubo ezinde nokuthwala ekhanda.
Yingakho-ke ithi lobu buhle obubonwa yile nsizwa obokujabulisa abanye abantu.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ephawulile wasekela

questions.topic: Kuyiqiniso ukuthi uma umuntu ekwazile ukuzikhethela impilo akabi nokusola abanye abantu. Kule noveli kunabalingiswa abazikhethele impilo abayiphilayo okube nemiphumela eyahlukene.

introduction: Kuyiqiniso ukuthi uma umuntu ekwazile ukuzikhethela impilo akabi nokusola abanye abantu.
Kule noveli kunabalingiswa abazikhethele impilo abayiphilayo okube nemiphumela eyahlukene.

points: UMhlengi Ngidi uyisoka likaNontobeko unothando lokuphila impilo yokuba ngumuntu wesifazane.
Ngaphambi kokuba ayoziguqula ubulili akavele nje anyamalale emehlweni kaNontobeko kepha ufika efulethini lakhe umtshela ukuthi mabehlukane nakuba engamtsheli isizathu.
Uphinda wenza ubulungiswa uya kuManqoba Ngidi, uyise, ngenhloso yokumtshela ngempilo ayiphilayo.

UMhlengi ulalela uNgidi uma emkhombisa isipho sakhe amthengele sona, ipulazi. Kunokuba asijabulele isipho ubuza uNgidi ukuthi umthanda ngokweqiniso na? Uma evuma uNgidi uMhlengi umtshela ukuthi u'gay'.
UNgidi uyamxosha. UMhlengi uyaxolisa, umtshela ukuthi uyamthanda njengoyise kepha uphuma esenyobozela.
UNontobeko uyehluleka ukwamukela ukwaliwa nguMhlengi, wephula ilungelo lokuphila ngoba uphuma efulethini lakhe uziphonsa emgwaqeni, ashayiswe imoto kaNkululeko.
Uvuma ukuthandana noNkululeko kepha ambekele umbandela wokuthi aze angaphatheki kabi uma ehluleka ukuqhubeka nothando lwabo.
Uvuma ukushada noNkululeko, amale ngaphambi kosuku lomshado qede ahambe ngabo lobo busuku ukuyofuna uMhlengi.
Ufika kwaNgidi eGcilima, ufuna uMhlengi ngoba enethemba lokuthi bazobuyelana. Ugcina ngokumthola uMhlengi kodwa usenguMahlengi, usephila impilo yokuba ngumuntu wesifazane, akhale.
Impilo ekhethwe nguXolani imlethela izinkinga empilweni yakhe. Wephula isethembiso asenze noLungile oyinkosikazi yakhe.
Wehluleka ukulalela umhlangano wosomabhizinisi, usanganiswa ukubona intokazi enhle enguMahlengi.
Ukhetha impilo yokukhohlisa uLungile uma emshayela ucingo uthi kukhona okumbambile yingakho engekho ekhaya.
Uvakashela uMahlengi efulethini afike aphuze utshwala, abuye ebusuku emzini wakhe.
Eshiya izingane zodwa ebusuku zigcine zisha nendlu, zishone aye kodla noMahlengi eJohn Dory's.
UNgidi ukhetha ukungaganwa ngemuva kokushiywa ngunina kaMhlengi embeletha ngoba enothando lokukhulisa uMhlengi.
Uyehluleka ukwamukela inkulumo kaMhlengi uma emtshela ukuthi uyi 'gay'. Uyamxosha umthembisa isibhamu.
Wamukela uNontobeko, umhlalisa kwakhe, akamkhuzi noma futhi akambonisi uma ebona udaba lubhalwe ephephandabeni 'Ifa Lamehlo'.
Wephula isethembiso sokulobola uNomalanga Ndlovu, umshiya engamazisi ngesinqumo asithathile sokufuna uMhlengi.

conclusion: Impela kuyiqiniso ukuthi uma umuntu ekwazile ukuzikhethela impilo akabi nokusola abanye abantu.
Kule noveli kunabalingiswa abazikhethele impilo okube nemiphumela eyahlukene empilweni yabo.
Abanye babe nokuzisola ngokuzikhethela impilo njengoNontobeko noXolani.

model_answers: Umlandi usingenisela indaba ngokusichazela isimo sikaXolani ayeseyiso emuva kokubonana noMahlengi.
Usichazela ukuthi uyacabanga konke obekukade kwenzeka aze agicne esehleka yedwa.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ewuchazile umsebenzi womlandi

model_answers: UMahlengi wanikeza uXolani ikhadi lakhe lebhizinisi elinenombolo yocingo.
UMahlengi wavuma ukuvakashelwa nguXolani ngemuva komhlangano.
UMahlengi wabamba ucingo lukaXolani yize wayenesoka lakhe uNdumiso.
UMahlengi wavuma ukuphuma noXolani beyodla isidla sakusihlwa eJohn Dory’s.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma efingqile isigameko kulesi siqeshana

model_answers: La mazwi aveza isimo senhlalo esihle nesihambisana nendlela okwenzeka ngayo njengoba uMahlengi ekhombisa ukukhululeka, utshela uXolani ukuthi wamukelekile uma efuna ukuvakasha.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ewavezile amazwi

model_answers: uLungile athanda ngalo uXolani olomshado njengoba bevezwe bengabashadikazi. Uyinkosikazi yakhe ethembekile futhi emhloniphayo umyeni wayo.
Uthando uMahlengi analo ngoXolani olungamukelekile ngoba lwagcina seluphazamisa umshado.
UMahlengi naye wayethandana noNdumiso kepha uma uthando lukaXolani selumehlula ubhala incwadi yokwala isoka lakhe elinguNdumiso.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma eqhathanisile uthando lwabalingiswa

model_answers: Ngiyazwelana naye ngoba uzithola esengena ezindlekweni abekade engazilindele. Kwase kumele alungise imoto yakhe. Angagcini lapho azame ukuthola isikhathi sokuvakashela uNontobeko esibhedlela.
NOMA
Angizwelani naye ngoba uNontobeko nguyena owaziphonsa emotweni kaNkululeko ngenxa yokwaliwa nguMhlengi. Kwakungelona iphutha likaNkululeko.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ekuvezile ukuzwelana /nokungazwelani

model_answers: Isigameko esiyisingeniso sale siqeshana esokubamba inkunzi kukaNdumiso epulazini likaNgidi.
UNdumiso owabe eqambe amanga ezibize ngokuthi unguSibalukhulu ubamba inkunzi, uthatha imali kaNgidi.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eshilo isigameko esitholakala esingenisweni

model_answers: UNdumiso uvezwe njengomlingiswa onobugebengu/ onesihluku/ ongenanembeza/onomona. Ubamba uNgidi inkunzi, uthatha imali esisefweni.
Ubuye avezwe njengomlingiswa odelelayo, uyanxapha, asikaze uNgidi uma embiza ngoSibalukhulu.
Aphinde avezwe njengomlingiswa onomona, uma ebona imali kaNgidi aze ancincize.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eshilo ukuvezwa komlingiswa

model_answers: Umbhali uhlose ukugqamisa ukuthi abangabukelwa phansi abantu abaphila nokugula/ukukhubazeka ngoba nabo bangabantu abakwazi ukulekelela uma kunesidingo.
UNyambose uyalekelela kwaNgidi uma ebona ukuthi isango lishiywe lingalivaliwe, uyalivala.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eyinikezile inhloso yombhali

model_answers: Ngicabanga ukuthi wawuzoba muhle. UNgidi wayezokwamukela, aqhubeke nokuthanda uMhlengi, andise amapulazi akhe, ebonisana noMhlengi.
NOMA
Ngicabanga ukuthi wawuzoba mubi. Kwakuzodingeka ukuba uNgidi aphile impilo yokuzenzisa. Kwakuzomphoqa ukuba azame ukwamukela lesi simo sendodana yakhe.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma ewuvezile umphumela empilweni yabalingiswa

model_answers: Umbhali uphumelele kahle ukuphetha le ndaba kuvuthondaba ngoba inkinga ebibhekene nomlingiswa omkhulu ixazululekile.
Bonke abalingiswa abekade bekhathazekile balitholile iqiniso lokuthi wayekade engumuntu wesilisa kodwa usezishintshile waba ngumuntu wesifazane.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma ekwazile ukuphawula wasekela

questions.topic: Lesi sitatimende esishiwo umbhali siliqiniso ngoba cishe yonke imizi iyaba nezinkinga ebhekana nazo njengoba nakulo mdlalo zikhona izinkinga ezikhungethe umuzi kaMdaluli.

introduction: Lesi sitatimende esishiwo umbhali siliqiniso ngoba cishe yonke imizi iyaba nezinkinga ebhekana nazo njengoba nakulo mdlalo zikhona izinkinga ezikhungethe umuzi kaMdaluli.

points: UMdaluli oyinhloko yaleli khaya uphelelwa ngumsebenzi kade kunguye kuphela osebenzayo nowondlayo ekhaya.
Lokhu kushabalalisa wonke amathemba akhe akade enawo ngomndeni wakhe.
UMdaluli uyahluleka ukukhokha isikweletu sasekolishi lapho kufunda khona uLondiwe.
Lokhu kudala ingcindezi kuphinde kushabalalise nenjabulo kuye kanye nasemndenini wakhe.
Lokhu kudala ingcindezi enkulu kuMdaluli uphelelwa wuthando lokudla uma umkakhe emphakela.
Ushaya umkakhe kusihlwa kuze kusiza ukufika kukaManqina ezolamula lolu dungunyane.
Aphinde ashaye uMaMlanduli ebusuku uma enqaba ukumnikeza indabandaba okugcina elahlekelwa ukuhlonishwa izingane zakhe njengoba uLondiwe abiza amaphoyisa.
UMdaluli uvundulula ikhono lakhe lakudala lokwakha izindlu.
Uthola umsebenzi wokwakha umuzi kaSaziwayo Ntenga waseMangethe usindwa zinyawo ngoba uphucwa iqatha emlonyeni uChivenga.
UChivenga ubiza amanani aphansi, lokhu kuphuca kukaMdaluli isinkwa emlonyeni kwadala ukuba isimo sasemzini wakhe sibe sibi kakhulu.
UMdaluli abe nomona athakathe uChivenga. UChivenga ubolelwa yisandla agcine eselaliswe esibhedlela.

conclusion: Umbhali uphumelele kahle ukuveza ukuthi awukho umuzi ongenazo izinkinga.
Izinkinga ezibhekene nomuzi kaMdaluli ezitholakala ngenhla ziyakufakazela ukuthi yilowo nalowo muzi unezinkinga zawo.

model_answers: Kusemzini kaChivenga kwaHlomendlini.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza imaki elilodwa uma esinikezile isizinda sendawo

model_answers: UHlengiwe uzombheka uChivenga ukuthi useyalulama lokho kukhombisa ukumkhathalela nothando ngokuzombona uyamzwela ngisho nasezinhlungwini abonakala ekuzo.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma esigagulile isenzo

model_answers: Imbangela yesimo senhlalo esingesihle ukulimala kukaChivenga emuva kokuthi eshaywe uMdaluli.
Uze walaliswa esibhedlela.
UHlengiwe kuyamkhathaza ukumbona esezinhlungwini uze abone ukuthi basheshe bamkhipha esibhedlela engakalulami kahle.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eyichazile kafushane imbangela

model_answers: Isigameko esasifihlelwe umlingiswa onguHlengiwe esokuthi uChivenga wayesenze ubugebengu ehlangene noHeshana washintsha ipasi likaHlengiwe walibhala isibongo sakhe kwasengathi sebeshadile.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma esibhalile isigameko esasifihlelwe umlingiswa

model_answers: Lezi zenzo zokushintshwa kwamapasi azikho emthethweni.
UHlengiwe wanikeza uChivenga ipasi lakhe ngethemba lokuthola umsebenzi. Labuya selithi ushade noChivenga.
Baningi abantu abazithola sebeshadile nabantu abangabazi ngaphandle kokuvumelana nabo njengoba kwenzekile nakuHlengiwe.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma eyamanise izigameko wasekela

model_answers: Ivumakabili lalibikezela ukuthakathwa kukaChivenga ethakathwa nguMdaluli.
Ivumakabili inyoni eyaziwa ngokuba nomoya omubi, ivamise ukusetshenziswa ngabathakathi.
Nempela uChivenga wathakathwa uMdaluli wabola isandla.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma exoxile ngesibikezelo

model_answers: UChivenga wayelaliswe esibhedlela ngenxa yokuhlaselwa alinyazwe nguMdaluli ngokumshaya ngemolontshisi.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma eyibhalile imbangela

model_answers: Umoya ovezwa uChivenga owokujabula njengoba evakashelwe isithandwa sakhe uHlengiwe yize esezinhlungwini.
Uyaqhubeka umbiza ngamagama amnandi akhombisa uthando, umbiza ngomayitukluza, mntakwethu nangethambo lakhe leKentucky.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma exoxile ngomoya

model_answers: Izenzo ezenziwa nguMdaluli kuChivenga zimveza njengomlingiswa oyigwala.
Waqala ngokuthakatha uChivenga wabola umunwe.
Waphinda wamhlasela ngemolontshisi. Lokho kwakungubugwala ngoba wayesaba ukubangisana naye ebhizinisini.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma ewubekile umbono wezenzo zabalingiswa

model_answers: Inhloso yombhali yokusebenzisa uMbhebhezeli ukuqaphelisa abantu ukuthi kukhona abangani abangathembekile.
UMbhebhezeli ungumngani kaMdaluli amethembayo namxoxela zonke izinkinga zakhe. Uvela nesisombululo senkinga sokuthi makathakathe uChivenga.
Emveni kwalokho uhamba ngasese uvakashela uChivenga esibhedlela amtshele ukuthi uyamazi umuntu omthakathayo.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amathathu uma eyivezile inhloso

model_answers: Ngicabanga ukuthi ngangingemukela isimo esingehlele ngokuthi ngixoxisane nomndeni wami noma ngiye kodokotela abeluleka ngokwengqondo.
Ngangingaqhubeka nokufuna amatoho noma ngizisungulele ibhizinisi engingalenza ukuthola imali. Lokho kwakuzogwema udlame.
questions.marker_instruction: Nikeza amamaki amabili uma exoxe ngesisombululo wasekela
